flawed_nl_solution:
When he gave 40 seashells to his friends, Ali had 180-40= <<180-40=170>>170 seashells.
When he gave another 30 seashells to his brothers, he had 170-30 = <<170-30=140>>140 seashells
He also sold half of the seashells, a total of 1/2*140 = <<1/2*140=70>>70 seashells
He was left with 140-70= <<140-70=70>>70 seashells
#### 70

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 140, not 170. It appears there was a miscalculation with the digits before the final zero.
